audioText: Les cours de cuisine que j'ai suivis l'an dernier m'ont beaucoup aidé.
question: What helped the speaker a lot?
options: Cooking classes they took last year.
explanation: The text states 'Les cours de cuisine que j'ai suivis l'an dernier m'ont beaucoup aidé' - The cooking classes that I took last year helped me a lot. 'Suivis' is the past participle of 'suivre' (to follow/take), agreeing with the masculine plural noun 'cours'.
